archimate:BusinessProcess.name: 7 - Create MDFO Objects
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The system automatically creates a number of products used by the Monitoring & Forecasting and Flood Warning Duty Officers. These are viewed and stored in full on the NFFS client server and in reduced detail on the ‘NFFS Webservice’ together with Met Office products and information provided by the Flood Forecasting Centre (FFC).
